title: c_about_appsec_tutorials
description: Veracode AppSec Tutorials provide quick learning sessions on common software vulnerabilities. In under ten minutes, you can gain an understanding of a specific vulnerability, including how it can be exploited, examples of vulnerable code, and guidance on how to fix the vulnerability. When you do not have time to take an entire Veracode eLearning course, you can view an AppSec Tutorial to learn about application security best practices.
